channel.title: Publications on Philippe Grosjean
channel.description: Recent content in Publications on Philippe Grosjean

item.title: RAPID: Research on automated plankton identification
item.description: This publication is written by members of the SCOR WG 130 Automatic Visual Plankton Identification.

item.title: FLR: an open-source framework for the evaluation and development of management strategies
item.description: FLR, the Fisheries Library in R, is a collection of tools for quantitative fisheries science, developed in the R language, that facilitates the construction of bio-economic simulation models of fisheries systems.

item.title: Enumeration, measurement, and identification of net zooplankton samples using the ZOOSCAN digital imaging system
item.description: The ZOOSCAN is patented and commercialized, currently by Hydroptic.
